brownfield site.translation[0].definitio: a place, especially in a city, that is used for building homes, offices etc, where in the past there have already been buildings, industries etc
brownfield site.translation[1].definitio: a site used for building where there has already been building, industrial activity etc, especially in a town or city
The government wants to raise the proportion of housing built on brownfield sites, rather than on unspoilt countryside.
